node.address: BRR Getsemani CR 10C 29 158, Cll del espiritu santo Cra. 10 # S/N, Cartagena , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
Hostal Getsemani is located in the historic center of Cartagena, Getsemani. It is close to the media luna street, the most touristic street in Cartagena, with all the bars and hostels located. Close by exists the placa de Trinidad, a public space with cultural events and the possibility to eat. Supermarkets are close by as well as ATM´s. The historic center is 5minuts walk away.The historic center with all its museums, parques and beautiful houses is 5 minutes walk away. There is a beach 15min away, otherwise there is also the possibility to go by boat directly from the hostel to Playa Blanca beach, a marvelous beach.

We have Dorms and private rooms. The Dorms are of 8 and 10 beds. They are equipped with air condition, lockers and their space to put the luggage. The Dorm of 10beds has a balcony towards the small and quiet street in which the hostel is located.
The private rooms have a double bed, their own bathroom and a mirror. One of the rooms has its own hammock.

Hostal Getsemaní has a restaurant, bar, a shared lounge and garden in Cartagena de Indias. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Local points of interest like Cartagena's Walls and Bolivar Park are reachable within 2.3 km and 2.7 km, respectively.
Guests at the hostel can enjoy an American breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include San Felipe de Barajas Castle, Cartagena de Indias Convention Centre and Cartagena's Modern Art Museum. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 6 km from Hostal Getsemaní.
Getsemani is a great choice for travellers interested in nightlife, culture and architecture.

description.description: Hostal Getsemani is a house of 600m² and has a big patio. There are 4 big trees which give shade. It exists a terrace. The house has 3 dorms and 3 private rooms. There is a big kitchen, a small bar, laundry and hammocks to relax. We also offer free WiFi, air conditioning, free city map and cable TV.
